extends PlayerUnitTypeMelee

      • customUpdate

        protected void customUpdate()
        Should be called at least one time from the sub class if overwritten. It is updating all necessary information regarding various tasks the worker can execute as well as shared information between all workers.

      • generateAttackableEnemyUnitToReactTo

        protected bwapi.Unit generateAttackableEnemyUnitToReactTo()
        Description copied from class: PlayerUnit
        Function for generating / finding the Unit that this one has to react to when taking any offensive actions. The Unit has to chose between different kinds of Units in it's surrounding like workers or centers.
        Overrides:
        generateAttackableEnemyUnitToReactTo in class PlayerUnit
        Returns:
        the Unit that this one should react to when taking offensive actions.

      • tryMappingExecutingUnitToTargetOne

        private bwapi.Unit tryMappingExecutingUnitToTargetOne(bwapi.Unit targetUnit)
        Function for mapping a worker Unit to another target Unit. This function utilizes a UnitMapper to ensure that only one single worker is mapped to a potential target at a time.
        Parameters:
        targetUnit - the Unit that the worker Unit is going to be mapped to if possible.
        Returns:
        if either the Unit was successfully mapped to the target one or already is the returned Unit is the targetUnit provided by the caller. Otherwise null, since the mapping of the worker failed.

        Overrides:

        Returns:

        public void destroy()
        Description copied from interface: IPlayerUnitWrapper
